title: Capricor rockets 18% after crucial drug trial wins
description: Capricor Therapeutics found itself in the spotlight on December 3 after delivering news that sent its stock soaring in premarket trading. The small biotech company announced that its experimental therapy for Duchenne muscular dystrophy achieved success in a p…
